monument.name: monument
monument.context: Before you stands an odd megastructure approximately 40 meters in height, and 5x5 meters in width and length. It's shaped like a thin pyramid, with various degraded inscriptions along each of its corners, and appears to be a religious monument of some sort due to its complex ornamentation.

K1.def: You notice a small, rough potrusion on the side of the otherwise unnaturally smooth surface of the monument. Small specs of dust fall out of its cracks, hinting at its recent apparition.

K1-1.def: The monument trembles in front of you. Pieces from its top plummet to the ground.

C1-1.res: The structure collapses, you escape without getting hurt.

C1-2.def: Try to dodge the debris, but stay at the monument.
C1-2.res: A piece of the monument falls on you, your ankle is badly injured, but you are otherwise fine. The monument is destroyed.

K1-2.def: The extrusion slides further out and revelas a semi-decomposed alien corpse. Its fingers are curled around some sort of scroll.

C2-1.res: You grab the scroll from the creature's hands. It revelas a mythical telling of an epic battle that occured near this site. Most of the writing has unfortunately washed away, but you can make out a few key words that describe the incident as a major event that would bring peace for thousands of years.

C2-2.def: Push the coffin back into the monument.
C2-2.res: The coffin fits back into the monument. A silent, low-pitched hum spreads through the air. Everything is calm.

K2.def: Lines driving up the monument's smooth walls light up a cyan blue and illuminate the dust floating in the atmosphere. The lights lead to an open door on the side of the megastructure.

C1.res: The door closes right as you attempt to enter it, clipping one of your fingers and breaking a part of it.

C2.def: Wait to see if anything comes out the door.
C2.res: The door slowly closes, the lights of the structure dim.
